Campus Life:CAMPUS LIFE: In AIT Annual Fest & Tech Fest are conducted in mid of february month. Availability of books and jaurnals in the library is too less or many books is not available . The classroom at AIT have smart board and AC and nice seting arrangment . Our campus is also cunduct a Sports week every year . AIT has social groups and clubs that are running by studends like GDSC, Photograph club.

College Name: Amritsar College of Engineering and Technology - [ACET]
Info: In every room there will be 4 boys and one bathroom which is very small and there is facility for canteen. Hostel food is very bad and unhygenic. In one year i rarely 5 or 6 time does breakfast. In full week they give us pulses and one vagetable item which look very dirty and one time panner, halwa and kheer in whole week. 32500 will be the charges for per semmester. Average price of pg is upto 4500 and of you make a group of 4 or 5 people for a flat it cost around 2000 to 3000 and 2000 to 2500 average tiffin from outside.

College Name: Amritsar College of Engineering and Technology - [ACET]
Info: The Hostel facility is also provided to students. In every room 4 students are allotted and each student is given 1 table and chair,1 almirah. Three times meal are provided and meal quality is very average.

College Name: Amritsar College of Engineering and Technology - [ACET]
Info: The hostel good. The rooms are semifinished with some of them having AC facilities. If you need ac room you need to pay extra fee. 4 or 3 or 2 students can live in a single room. Depending upon the fee they pay are provided with much more things than the ordinary.

College Name: Amritsar College of Engineering and Technology - [ACET]
Info: I lived in a hostel for one year. Hostel rooms are semi-furnished with a lot of space available for stuff u have. There are 3-4 beds in every room. 4 chairs and 3 tables and almirah or lockers in some rooms. Ac rooms are also present which charge you extra money. Annual hostel fee is 64000. The mess is clean but they serve only veg food.

College Name: Amritsar College of Engineering and Technology - [ACET]
Info: Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel Hostel is for boys and kalpana chawala hostel for girls. The college hostel provides 4,3,2 seater rooms for international as well as national students.In four seater room there are four beds with attached bathroom.In every room there are four tables and four chairs and almirahs also.Meal is not too good.

Hostel rooms are avail: single-person, double and triple-bed occupancy. double bed with balcony is about Rs.92000/- per year. the hostel provides 24x7 electricity Air cooled room wifi features food and mess with 4 times in day

Being a hosteller I am very much satisfied with the hostel facilities. In a room, there is a single bed a study table, a cupboard, and an attached washroom. The hostel registration process is also online. A 24x7 study room facility is also available to hostellers.

Yes, The Hostel rooms are actually very good with a large space room, Cleaning is done on a daily basis, Mess Food Is provided to us, Also Gym and other facilities are provided with them. You can choose from eithe single double and triple shared room with AC or Air cooled Facility. The Charges for hostel is around 1,07,000 for double shared room. 87,000 for triple shared room and 1,22,000 for Single room

No, i haven't opt for hostel i live in PG where my monthly rent is 8000 and food charges are included in that. And i got full facilities over there. In hostel faculties also live and for every hostel building there is a teacher warden, both official and unofficial.

No, i was a local resident, so in first 2 years i opted for local transport and later opted for personal one. I have my parental house here in jaipur so used to up down from here only ; yes but hostel was very costly so i opted for 3 hrs of travel time over the hostel.

College Name: M H Saboo Siddik College of Engineering - [MHSSCOE]
Info: There is no college hostel there is a hostel near to college those are private hostel one of them is sobani hostel near CST railway station. It also has a maze. It will cost you around 1 lakh per year. They do not provide lunch only breakfast and dinner from Monday to Saturday and no dinner on Sunday lunch is there on Sunday.

College Name: M H Saboo Siddik College of Engineering - [MHSSCOE]
Info: Yes i was residing in th the hostel. The rooms were quite up to the mark. They provided sharing rooms to students, and it was a complete students only hostel with no PGs. The payment was around 40k for a year. The food quality was okay. They did provide some good facilities to the students.

College Name: M H Saboo Siddik College of Engineering - [MHSSCOE]
Info: I wasn't staying in the hostel. Few friends stayed, it was good, quite costly around 50k a year. Food was okay.

College Name: M H Saboo Siddik College of Engineering - [MHSSCOE]
Info: No i wasn't residing in the hostel, as my house was near. But from friends came to know that tht hotel service was good. Sharing rooms were provided, and it was only for the college students. Cost was also affordable around 40k per year. The food quality was a bit okay, not much good.

College Name: M H Saboo Siddik College of Engineering - [MHSSCOE]
Info: I was residing in a hostel. The wastel was good. Mostly there were shared rooms. No PGs, only college students. The payment was around 50k for a year inclusive of all. The quality of food was above average. But it was fun staying at hostels

Campus Life:There are multiple fests done in this college . One of the biggest fest is done in winters in college . The library of this college is best and overall all imp books are available in this library .The facilities provide to students are best and sports are played well in this college overall sports quota is very good . There are multiple of social clubs present in the college and multiple groups get formed for competitions and impact of this environment is very good pn every student's .

Campus Life:The college is good in its extracurricular activities. They have various sports activities like football, basketball and so on. They also organize cultural functions like fest and fates in which many other institutions take part and students get abundant exposure.

Campus Life:For my course, the ratio of boys to girls is quite dis balanced as it is in many other colleges in the mechanical engineering and it is more of a all boys field but otherwise the college has everything just fine.

Campus Life:Extracurricular activities were the only thing we hoped for at the end of the long, tiring day. We had a huge ground where we would play sports with our friends and other classmates. It was one of my best college memories.

Campus Life:To cater the needs of students physical development, various activities at regular intervals were arranged. Students enjoyed the sports and athletics during the Annual Sports meet. I participated in most of this. They also give awards.

College Name: Drs. Kiran and Pallavi Patel Global University
Info: The hostel facility is very good. Each room has 3 beds and 3 study tables and chairs provided by the hostel. The meal is also the good menu is decided according to our opinion. Hostel fees are 100000 per year. Laundry service is also provided by the hostel

College Name: Drs. Kiran and Pallavi Patel Global University
Info: There is a seperate girls and a boys hostel with a 3 sharing per room basis. There are about 150 student capacity of the girls hostel and about 500 students in the boys hostel. It has an attached bathroom and a balcony. Both ac and non ac rooms are available. 0The rooms are kept extremly clean by the household helps provided. Students need not to worry about the cleanliness and also security guard is always present with cameras all over the place. Further the warden is always there to look after the needs if the students. The mess is attached with fully centralised ac.

College Name: Drs. Kiran and Pallavi Patel Global University
Info: Yes, out of four years of my graduation i stayed at the hostel for 2 years and that experience was fabulous. As compared to the fees the accomodations is very good. I personally give the hostel an score of 9/10.

College Name: Drs. Kiran and Pallavi Patel Global University
Info: The college provides top notch hostel facility for both boys and girls, separately. They have AC and NON AC fully furnished 2 and 3 seater rooms, that includes attached washroom, common dining hall and audiovisual room for entertainment purpose.

College Name: Drs. Kiran and Pallavi Patel Global University
Info: Yes i was in Hostel for 2 years. The hostel is in the same college campus. There are different hostels for boys and girls. The infrastructure is very good. The rate are okay and it would be better if it was less. Facilities are very good

I was a hosteller and I enjoyed a lot living there for 4 years. The hostels are very good and well equipped with the facilities a student needs. There is also a mesh facility and the foods there are very yummy. For getting a hostel in college you have to contact our warden, sir, after getting registered in the admin office. The rooms are very good with good electricity availability for 24 hours.

The cit provide us with hostels but the hostel was not good it actually so expensive and not good as expected. And d hostel fees is 28000 per semester and hostel meal is poor in quality and hostel registration is done during the semester registration.

The Hostel was good, but I prefer for rented room and the hostel meal quality is average so if you are staying anywhere you will cook yourself it was so much better than a hostel meal. Under 2km from college, you will get PG Or any rent room.

Campus Life:There is an annual fest in the month of November named GENESIS There are lot of books related to the course and for competitive exams in library Faculties are well educated and they taught us in smart classes There are many sports grounds and courts in the campus There is a DIAS club

Campus Life:Annual and technical festivals are held in the month of April and the fest's name is Genisis. The range and accessibility of books and journals in the library are enough and in a very large Amount. Digital classrooms and labs were available. Sports were also provided.

College Name: Coimbatore Institute of Engineering and Technology - [CIET]
Info: Our college hostel offers comfortable and secure accommodations, with fully furnished rooms, and amenities like gym, guest room, recreation room,and mess serving good meals. Here 2 sharing and 4 sharing rooms are available. Study time are strictly maintained.

College Name: Coimbatore Institute of Engineering and Technology - [CIET]
Info: The hostel here is a 4 sharing or 2 sharing rooms. The food that is provided is good. There are study hours around 9 to 10.30 pm. Staffs here help with needs. The students are raken to hospital anytime in case of emergency where the management has provided ambulance.

College Name: Coimbatore Institute of Engineering and Technology - [CIET]
Info: Hostel fees for this college are 60000 per year for every student. They provide both veg and non-veg for the students. They provide chicken and egg for each person per week (non-veg) and for veg students they provide mushroom and banana for each person per week. My hostel is located in Narasipuram in Coimbatore.

College Name: Coimbatore Institute of Engineering and Technology - [CIET]
Info: Hostel room has good ventilation, a study table, a quality cot to sleep and wardrobe for each students to keep their belongings. Meal quality is very decent and menu has 2 days of Non-veg and 5 days of Veg. Hostel is very much affordable for students. Registration for hostel happens as part of student admission itself.

College Name: Coimbatore Institute of Engineering and Technology - [CIET]
Info: 4 students share 1 room. Each student has a separate cupboard bed, chair, and table. Bathroom and toilet cleaning daily. Food will be very tasty. We will get Tiffen items, snacks, tea, coffee, veg, and nonveg. Health and hygiene. Easily register for hostel once we got admission. Low hostel fee compared to other colleges. We can take a room near the college with 2km. No pG available.

My College doesn't provide hostel facility for boys but College has a women's hostel which is very much feasible and infrastructure wise too it is good , as it was build just I'm the year 2015 or around .

Campus Life:Dance club ,alumini association ,union club sports are cricket football chess tennis are there and extra curricular activities are techfest industrial visit and there are so many other programmes in college

Campus Life:Technical festivals , arts , sports , and all kind of celebrations are well held in this college . Without interrupting or disturbing lecture hours all kinds of celebrions are done . If we miss more classes due to arts or others , lecturers make sure they make up the missed classes . Library provide vast varieties of books that can access for free Sports are well held . Both boys and girls are participating in all kinds of sports . There are many student-run clubs , groups , startup's in this college .

Campus Life:There were all type culturals and sports annually. There were Arts day ,sports day,Annual day,etc proggrams were beautiful.Any one can perform on those fests.There were Tech fests also there.The campus life is unforgettable memory.
The room contain a bed, shelf and study table with a chair If anyone wants they can easily access the hostel I don't rent any room The hostel have one warden Overall hostel facility is good

College Name: D. Y. Patil College of Engineering
Info: If you take PG it is very comfortable and all facilities are provided like WiFi hot water 24/7 access to enter and exit Food in Pune is very high class do you get large no. Of hotels and mess for food Hostel PG Rooms all are available in 1km.area of college don't worry about it

College Name: D. Y. Patil College of Engineering
Info: The hostel i live in is the private one which doesnt comes under college facility.Here i pay the rent of 72000 yearly. Meal here in this area is pretty good.Registration for the hostel is very simple,you just need to visit there.

College Name: D. Y. Patil College of Engineering
Info: The college hostel is good there are rooms according to your convince. There are 2 shearing and 3 Shearing rooms available. Mess is also good. In the college area, many pg are also available. You also can stay there. In the meal of college mess at morning, they provide you breakfast tea and coffee in afternoon lunch and in night dinner.

College Name: D. Y. Patil College of Engineering
Info: yes hostel infrastructure is too good like food facilities and 24/7 hot water, light and full safety for girls and hostel has also garden and play ground, gym, TV room and indoor games availabity and thorugh out the year we celebrate festival in hostel like ganpati, navratri, koja giri, new year, dahi handi festival, deshra, holi, so student will not feel bad in hostel it is like you are live in at your home and enjoy every festival. and hostel is just infront of college and you can go anywhere between 6 AM to 8pm.

College Name: D. Y. Patil College of Engineering
Info: The hostel facilities are really good with proper fooding and all other amenities. There are also a lot of PGs and rooms available which costs around 60k without food. U can adjust your amenities there and the food costs around 40k outside with variety of choices and you will not get bored. I'm myself one of those who lives in PG

College Name: Dr. Sudhir Chandra Sur Institute of Technology & Sports Complex - [SURTECH]
Info: 2-3 students could very well stay in each room of the college hostel. The food was fairly good. If you want to take a hostel, you have to fill a separate form at the time of admission. And if a student does not want to take a hostel, he can easily get a pg, because there is no shortage of pug in dum dum.

College Name: Dr. Sudhir Chandra Sur Institute of Technology & Sports Complex - [SURTECH]
Info: Hostel rooms are okay-ish, need to be upgraded with air-conditioning on summer days. The facilities provided are a bit dated and needs a lot of work to be done or just replace it with a new and improved one to provide a better standard of living. The hostel is out of the college campus which needs to be brought inside. Food is very vague same as the case with the rest of the colleges' hostels. The food for day scholars which can be bought aren't up to mark either. Small rooms in hostels accomodating 3 people which should be 2, 3rd yr and final yr students should be given separate rooms to study for campusing and job interviews. At least provide washrooms for each room. Overall needs a lot of work to be done in the hostel department as well the college campus, college classrooms.

College Name: Dr. Sudhir Chandra Sur Institute of Technology & Sports Complex - [SURTECH]
Info: Our college's hostel is better. Their students could stay secured and safe. The hostel's environment is also good, there has good qualities room where attach washroom, and their water and electricity supplied on 24 hours, hostel security guards are always there in 24 hours, they are very good people, they are always given safety for us. Everything is good at the hostel.

College Name: Dr. Sudhir Chandra Sur Institute of Technology & Sports Complex - [SURTECH]
Info: They provide meals for 4 times a day. Breakfast lunch dinner and snacks in the evening. Hostel rooms are comfortable.

College Name: Dr. Sudhir Chandra Sur Institute of Technology & Sports Complex - [SURTECH]
Info: If I have opted for hostel, then I've to pay Rs - 5,000/- more at every month with the semester fees. Hostels are not bad. Infrastructure and the facilities are very good of the hostel. They gave students two breakfast, meal, dinner in a day.

Hostel has so many good things like we have wifi 1gb per second. Water purifier on every floor. We have security on every floor and camera on every floor.fees pf hostel is 120000 for premium it has best south and North Indian food. Room is very comfy for students and no disturbances.

1. I didn't liked the hostel room according to the fee it was not worthy. 2. They will provide only sambar, idli etc basically the south indian food. 3. You will get a hostel room easily. 4. There are so many pgs and flats available near the college.

*The hostel is neat and clean *in the room they provide cap boards and study tables *Meals are good weekly they provide 2 days chiken biriyani *The hostel rules are very strict *In the hostel they provide cold,hot,normal water.

room is well-lit and ventilated. water facility is taken care of 24/7, and CCTV surveillance makes it safe. mess food provided is quite good, taking into consideration the food practices of students from various parts of India. the hostel has a separate admission block and office where all hostel and mess related queries are solved.

I rate 3.5. It's a sharing room I guess it's placed with good bed comforts and cupboards. As I have not stayed in hostel have no much idea about the hostel. Food is provided all three times a day with good taste.

Hostel life is a little bit hectic . The hostel rooms are quite good and clean but the hostel food is not that good. people here don't like thefood and often people here order food from outside. 65000 is the hostel fees and the food is not worth it.

GITA also provide hostels. There are 7 girls hostel and 17 boys hostel was present. Hostel meal was good and the menu changes every 2 months. There are 4,2,1 sitters rooms are available. Outside college there are pg and rented house are available with a reasonable price

In GITA college there are 7 girls hostel and 17 boys hostel are present.. There are 4 sitter, 2 sitter, and 1sitter rooms are also available... The hostel is 2 or 4 accomodating. They are generally good and affordable. They are very well equipped and food is also decent. The food is notbad. Menu keeps changing and very affordable. Only 65000 per year

Ac rooms are available for one seater ,two seater and three seater all are furnished and attached bathrooms 4 times oer day meal is provided by mess. We other faculty for form fill for hostal registration. 95000 is my fees because i share my room in 3

hostel provieds us a well maintained and managable room which is enough for 3 students to live together. warden is very good and take care of every single student as their own child. meals which are provided by hostel to students is pretty good and tasty. we can register for hostel at the time of admission in college.

There are brilliant hostel facilities and there are 7 hostels 3 of girls and 4 of boys. And each hotel has it own warden which keep the students update and keep a check on them.

we have been provided a good amenities .in our hostel we got good food every sports kit and 2-3 playgrounds. Also, there was ac in my room and an attached bathroom. The meal quality was also average not that much good

Hostel facility is quite approvable as a matter of fact. 4 different meals are provided including breakfast, lunch, evening snacks and dinner. Also, the menu differs each day. The rooms of the hostel are quite spacious and furnished.

Hostel facility is not good and the food also we are adjusting in this hostel there no no proper food to us but we are paying 1 lakh per year .registration process for hostel and affordability is good ,we want to go rented room by the next year .

The hostel facility is very good, we will have Wi-Fi & will have two types of hostels International hostel & normal hostel fee for an international hostel is 100000 per year & normal hostel is 70000, the food provided in the hostel is average or below average & menu contains chicken two times a week & provides snacks every day & eggs twice a week.

My college hostel is very good at food and accommodation and is very high in giving all the required infrastructures to us we eat and than play in the ground provided by the hostel and they make us to study at the study hours and we do have snacks at every time interval. The quality of the meal is too good and healthy. The hostel charges 45000 thousand and is same for every category. The collage Hostel is at our college premises in Rajahmundry

The Hostel Facility was So what not good, but the fees for the hostel was high. Amd the facilities also low. Average per room 4.members are there,and one iron bed was providing. It was some what high for the hostel. Local rentwd rooms was so good. And provding rooms for low cost.

The college will also provide the hostel facilities with good atmosphere and the room have 4 members with beds. The meal was extremely good and everyone likes that. The registration for hostel also be done in college itself.

Give details of facilities provided in the room Review of meal quality & menu Facilities provided like fan , there is different sides for Bihar students and for all other students Block a for Bihar and block b for other Registration Process for Hostel & Affordability Yes 7k security fees refundable but per semester you have to give 7k servent charge Mention the locality if you rented a room or PG

Hostel facilities are also good. They provide everything that a student needs in his/her room like bed tables, chairs, cupboards, and also a free WIFI connection. 3 4 caretakers are always available. Mess food quality is good.

Hostel facilities are very good in hostel , In first year we are 3 in one big room and in 2nd year we were 2 in one room and in 3rd and 4th year we live single. Mess food quality is average. Hostel are so much affordable and you can simply register online on our college website. Mess menu contains variety across the whole week.

There are 4 hostels in total, the 1st one is for 1st year, it is good, have separate washrooms and toilet. The 2nd one is for the 2nd year, it is less good than the 1st one. The 3rd one is for both 3rd and 4th years, it is like quarters, not good. 4th one is for girls, I don't know about that.

The hostel facilities are above average with a caretaker being for constant guidance. The basic necessities are provided. The mess food is quite good in taste with reasonable price. The menu is set by a committee formed by the students called the mess committee who work under the mentorship of a mess manager. The registration for the college is done once you are done with the admission process and the final payments are made only in cash at the college itself. The fee for the hostel is very affordable with the mess being a corporate one and the price being nothing more than 3300 per month for a three-time meal that includes 2 paranthas or 4 bread in the morning with tea/milk/coffee, and rice chapatti and dal in lunch and a vegetable with dal roti and dessert in the dinner. The extra expenses are 7000 rupees servant fee that is paid every semester. Although I didn't opt for a PG there are a bunch of them right in front of the college, so there are all the basic facilities provided.

Hostel facility is very good I will stay there for 3 years. In one room 3 members and hostel warden is very good manner person. The meals quality is my review is "It's ok" some times they make good food some times they made any mistakes. It's very simple for registration process

2 students per room are allowed. Hostel food and snacks will be worth. We will feel like a home away from home. Sports courts for girls are available within the hostel campus. Separate internet room is provided.

The hostel facility was good but the food was ok and food rating was 6 out of 10.Registration process was very easy and the college has own hostel so it is budget friendly.The location of hostel is located near the college.

My College is good in academics. But the food served in a hostel is bad(quality and taste). And fees consumed for the food are not workable. Rental rooms are good for the College location. The water facility is available 24/7. And got water will be served if needed.
